description: This file defines a Flutter widget, ScoreBar, which displays the current score and best score, styled with an Ocean theme. It includes internal classes and widgets such as _ScorePill for visual representation.

classes.name: ScoreBar
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays current score and best score with themed styling.

classes.name: _ScorePill
classes.description: A private stateless widget used internally by ScoreBar to display individual score badges with styling.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each of ScoreBar and _ScorePill, managing layout and styling.
